name: Redpitaya RadioBox
tagline: Red Pitaya - RadioBox application - Transmitter and Receiver add-ons for the FPGA and the ecosystem
body:
# Red Pitaya - RadioBox application

#### This repository enhances the RedPitaya hardware and the ecosystem by add-ons for ***Transmitting*** and ***Receiving*** radio signals.

It is intented to:
* expand the FPGA features as well as 
* creating an own **radio_box** application 

to the RedPitaya ecosystem.


***
created: 2015-09-05 - Ulrich Habel (DF4IAH) - aka: espero
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
